comments.raw_text: Currently, in a constructor message if AllocPWhatever returns null, we don't kill the child process.  Similarly, we let the child live if we can't find a shmem when trying to delete it by id.
comments.author: josh@joshmatthews.net
comments.text: Currently, in a constructor message if AllocPWhatever returns null, we don't kill the child process.  Similarly, we let the child live if we can't find a shmem when trying to delete it by id.
comments.creator: josh@joshmatthews.net
